metadata.synopsis: Default dialog for the Retired Fists vignette in the LOW Park situation.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to any of the Retired Fists in the lower city Park in BGO_Main_A

0.speaker: Vistra
0.text: In the old days those troublemakers would never have got so close to civvies.

1.speaker: Vistra
1.text: I tell you - it was all different back in the day. Being a Fist meant something.

2.speaker: Vistra
2.text: Fist these days cannae take a piss without a Steel Watcher helpin' them aim. It's pathetic.
